caption: A gentle wisp of steam curls upward from the open spout of a kettle, swirling gracefully in the warm air. The steam dances and twists, creating delicate patterns against a soft, blurred background. The hand holding the kettle lid hovers nearby, suggesting a recent removal to release the steam. The scene conveys a sense of warmth and tranquility, as if inviting someone to enjoy a freshly brewed cup of tea or coffee.
